data.comment: Today's referee, Gianluca Aureliano, has blown to start the match.
Sassuolo's Mert Muldur is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 1, Napoli to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 4, Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
Filip Djuricic of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
In the minute 6, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Napoli's Lorenzo Insigne misses with an attempt on goal.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
Napoli take a 1-0 lead thanks to Elseid Hysaj.
Piotr Zielinski with an assist there.
In the minute 9, Gianluca Aureliano awards Napoli a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Napoli.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Napoli.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Naples, Napoli push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 19, Napoli drive upfield and Lorenzo Insigne gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Sassuolo defenders.
In the minute 20, Napoli are pushing forward but Lorenzo Insigne's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
Sassuolo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 23, Napoli's Piotr Zielinski breaks free at Stadio San Paolo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Gianluca Aureliano awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Piotr Zielinski for Napoli drives towards goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Gianluca Aureliano blows against Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic for offside.
In the minute 33, Gianluca Aureliano awards the away team a throw-in.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Napoli are coming forward and Jose Callejon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Sassuolo are caught offside.
Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Napoli have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 39, Napoli have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Sassuolo.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 42, Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Napoli's Elseid Hysaj is on target but unsuccessful.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Gianluca Aureliano awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Naples.
Napoli awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sassuolo drives forward and Filip Djuricic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Filip Djuricic is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stadio San Paolo.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Naples to check on Mert Muldur, who is grimacing with pain.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, In Naples, Arek Milik of Napoli is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Piotr Zielinski of Napoli smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Jeremy Toljan is on a sub for Mert Muldur for Sassuolo.
In the minute 49, Sassuolo advance rapidly upfield but Gianluca Aureliano blows for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
Important block from the Napoli defence as Domenico Berardi fires in a strike for Sassuolo.
In the minute 52, Can Sassuolo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Napoli's half?
Sassuolo push upfield but Gianluca Aureliano quickly pulls them for offside.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
Throw-in Napoli.
Fabian Ruiz (Napoli) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Napoli's half.
Gianluca Aureliano waits before resuming play because Kostas Manolas for Napoli is still down.
In the minute 60, Nikola Maksimovic (Napoli) has replaced the possibly injured Kostas Manolas at Stadio San Paolo.
At Stadio San Paolo, Sassuolo are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Napoli's Arek Milik gets in a shot on goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Fabian Ruiz (Napoli) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Arek Milik (Napoli) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 67, Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Dries Mertens is replacing Arek Milik for the home team.
The home team replace Jose Callejon with Matteo Politano.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Filip Djuricic (Sassuolo) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 69, Dries Mertens is booked for the home team.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 73, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Sassuolo's Gian Marco Ferrari attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Gianluca Aureliano awards Napoli a goal kick.
Sassuolo make their second substitution with Giacomo Raspadori replacing Hamed Junior Traore.
In the minute 74, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marlon (Sassuolo) has received a yellow card from Gianluca Aureliano.
Gianluca Aureliano signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Naples.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Attention is being given to Napoli’s Piotr Zielinski and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 79, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Piotr Zielinski (Napoli) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Eljif Elmas.
Gennaro Gattuso is making the team's fifth substitution at Stadio San Paolo with Allan replacing Fabian Ruiz.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
In Naples Sassuolo attack through Jeremy Toljan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
The away team have replaced Manuel Locatelli with Giorgos Kyriakopoulos. This is the third substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
Lukas Haraslin is on a sub for Filip Djuricic for Sassuolo.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Napoli.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Naples.
Matteo Politano (Napoli) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Giacomo Manzari is replacing Rogerio for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gianluca Aureliano awards the home team a throw-in.
In Naples Napoli drive forward through Eljif Elmas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gianluca Aureliano will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Aureliano.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
That's full-time at Stadio San Paolo. The final score is 2-0.
Goal! Allan extends Napoli's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Dries Mertens.
